user-prompt-submit.name: code-quality-reminder
user-prompt-submit.script:
# Code Quality Reminder

When writing code, remember to:
- Follow Ultracite rules for type safety and accessibility
- Use React 19 and Next.js App Router patterns
- Validate all user input with Zod
- Add authentication to Server Actions
- Write comprehensive error handling

These best practices are enforced automatically by the plugin skills.

tool-call-attempt.name: prevent-unsafe-bash
tool-call-attempt.script:
# Check for potentially unsafe bash commands
if echo "$tool_name" | grep -q "^Bash"; then
  if echo "$tool_call_params" | grep -qE "rm -rf|dd if=|:(){ :|:& };:|mkfs|format|del /s"; then
    echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  Blocked potentially destructive command. Please review carefully."
    exit 1
  fi
fi
exit 0

tool-call-success.name: auto-format-after-edit
tool-call-success.script:
# Automatically run formatter after file edits
if [ "$tool_name" = "Edit" ] || [ "$tool_name" = "Write" ]; then
  # Suggest running formatter
  echo "üí° Consider running: pnpm biome format --write"
fi
exit 0

session-start.script:
